query: SELECT id, name, slug, LENGTH(slug) as slug_length, HEX(slug) as slug_hex FROM campaigns ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4BVDFYYBjXPHJtC.709074b71e30 --database EvJULGQoHRNqTu98ru5T2m --execute SELECT id, name, slug, LENGTH(slug) as slug_length, HEX(slug) as slug_hex FROM campaigns ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
